TextView.android:text: A drastic increase can be seen in food waste.Hence there is a need to come up with a solution that can avoid food waste by distributing the remaining food among the stray animals.This android-based Food Waste Management system can assist in collecting the leftover food from hotels,restaurants,wedding halls and distribute them among the stray animals.Donors will raise a request, in case if there is any leftover food in restaurants/hotels/wedding halls. The NGOs can accept the request and collect the food and distribute it among the stray animals suffering from starvation and malnutrition. In this way this android-based food waste management system will help restaurants/wedding halls/hotels to reduce food waste and help in feeding the stray animals. Donors can check the list of NGOs available,history of his/her donation of food and also view the status of donation .
